CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 离开；离去；遗留；留下；使保留；让…处于；使处于（某种状态）；使发生；放弃；辞职；休假；剩余；遗弃；丢弃；（去世时）遗赠；遗忘；忘记携带；忘了带；把…留交；递送；委托保管；允许保留；授权；批准离开
休假；假期；许可；批准；准许；（台球等运动中的）球的位置

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 离开者（常指学校毕业生）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 着重指违背法律责任和义务，或自己的信仰与誓言的行为，多含非难的意味。
普通用词，指舍弃某事或某一职业，或终止同一某人的关系，但不涉及动机与果。
普通用语，侧重指没有希望或因外界压力而放弃。
侧重断绝感情上的依恋，自愿抛弃所喜欢的人或物。也指抛弃信仰或改掉恶习。
强调永远或完全放弃或抛弃人或事物等，这可能是被迫的，也可能是自愿的。
侧重出发地而不是目的地。
可与leave换用，强调目的地，但不及leave普通。
较正式用词，指经过周密考虑或郑重地离开，强调离开的起点。
侧重指离开令人烦恼的地方，或摆脱使人不快的人或事。
书面用词。
一般用词，指从所在地到其它地方去，着重目的地而非出发地。
指按规定不工作的各种假日，时间可长可短。在英国复数形式表示较长的假期。
主要指政府机关工作人员或军队人员获准的休假、假期。
通常指时间较长的假期，如学校的寒暑假等。
指公众庆祝、欢度的节日。
语气最强，指权威性的允许与认可。
侧重不加干涉。
普通用词，侧重听任、默许或不加阻止。在正式场合可用来表客气的请求。
常用词，用于各种非正式场合，语气最弱，指允许或无力阻止某事，暗示漠不关心或听之任之。
正式用词，在多数场合可与allow换用，语义最强，指准许某人做某事，含权威或正式的意味。

word_group.brief_definition: 忽略, 不考虑；漏掉, 遗漏
留话；留个信息；留个短信
别再说了, 到此为止, 就这样算了
(让人停止做某事)行啦, 就这样吧
擅自；未经许可；粗鲁地, 无礼地

bilingual.source: I leave my home early every day.
They just make me want to leave!
I advised him to leave the factory.
bilingual.target: 我建议他离开那家工厂。

bilingual.source: They all leave the stage to the right.
bilingual.target: 他们都从右边离开舞台。

bilingual.source: I'll wake you up when it's time to leave.
bilingual.target: 到时间离开时我会叫醒你。

list.abstract: leave，英文单词，名词、及物动词、不及物动词，作名词时意为“许可，同意；休假”，作及物动词时意为“离开；留下；遗忘；委托”，作不及物动词时意为“离开，出发；留下”。
孙燕姿在2002年发行的专辑《leave》，此张专辑多元的乐风铺陈，音乐性强，态度鲜明，歌词的意义与歌手的连结更personal，由包小柏、李偲菘、李伟菘、马毓芬4位制作人担纲制作。专辑精神表现强烈的音乐专属性，打造孙燕姿的音乐新态度，所以“用音乐证明一切”直接挑战市场，证明歌手音乐力量的震撼，实至名归登基天后之位

yingyinNormal.en: Amore! No! Don't leave me!
yingyinNormal.zh: 亲爱的！不，别离开我！

yingyinNormal.en: That's the deal. Take it or leave it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就是条件，接受或者离开。

yingyinNormal.en: If you loved her, why did you leave her?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你真的爱她，那你为什么离开她？

yingyinNormal.en: Thanks for your consideration. now please leave.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢谢你的照顾，现在请你离开。

yingyinNormal.en: Come back! Please, don't leave me! I love you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 快回来！求你了，别离开我！我爱你。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait a minute. What time did your little friend leave?
yingyinNormal.zh: 等一下，你的小朋友是几点离开的？

yingyinNormal.en: You can't leave us. We're a danger to ourselves.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不能离开我们，不然我们会害死自己的。

yingyinNormal.en: It's actually a bassinet. Okay mommy, don't ever leave me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它是摇篮。好吧，妈妈，别离开我。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe I'll leave you two to finish that fascinating conversation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 或许我先离开吧，好让你们开始美妙的谈话。

yingyinNormal.en: But then you leave. You leave for college, you leave for New York, and now you're gonna fly across the ocean and take away my grandchildren. Me too, me too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是随后你们就会离开。你们离开去上大学，离开去纽约，现在你们又要横跨大西洋，带走我的孙子孙女。还有我，还有我。

yingyinNormal.en: Looks like she didn't leave in such a hurry after all.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看起来她似乎不急着离开。

yingyinNormal.en: Wonderful. Now, go away. Hey, I mean it. You've still got it! I'm asking you to leave.
yingyinNormal.zh: 太好了，现在请你离开我是认真的，你还是和以前一样棒。我叫你离开这里得了吧

yingyinNormal.en: This is bullshit. We won the war. Now we have to leave.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真是扯淡。我们打赢了。却得离开地球。

yingyinNormal.en: But before it can do that, the antibody needs to leave the cell.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但在那之前，抗体必须得离开细胞。

yingyinNormal.en: I said I'm done. It's over. Now would you please leave?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我说了我们结束吧，结束了，现在请你离开？

yingyinNormal.en: If you leave now, I will chop off my hand and give it to you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只要你愿意离开，我就把手砍下来送你！

yingyinNormal.en: We're not meant to save the world. We're meant to leave it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们不是要拯救这个世界，而是要离开它。

yingyinNormal.en: Unable to sway the others, he decided to leave the school.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他因为无法说服其他人，因此离开了这所学校。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: Wait a minute! I knowed you wouldn't leave without saying goodbye.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等一下！我知道你不会不说再见就离开的

yingyinNormal.en: Why? He says he wants to leave the country. He thinks you hate him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么？他想离开这个国家，他认为你恨他。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. （即将）离校（就业）者；离开者；故意中途退出游戏的玩家（游戏术语）

word_family.mean: v. 离开；离去；让…留下；使处于某种状态；离职；剩下；寄存；辍学；遗赠；忘记带走

sense_info_list.en: cause (someone or something) to be in a particular state or position

examination_example.sentence: The climate change we are hastening could one day <highlight>leave</highlight> us with forests that emit more carbon than they absorb.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们正在加速的气候变化可能有一天会让森林排放的碳超过它们吸收的碳。

examination_example.sentence: Like physical fights, verbal fights can <highlight>leave</highlight> both sides bloodied.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 和肢体冲突一样，言语冲突也会让双方流血。

examination_example.sentence: When <highlight>left</highlight> alone in the room, the students who did not know which ones would shock them clicked more pens.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当被单独留在房间里时，那些不知道哪些笔会电击他们的学生，按下了更多的笔头。

examination_example.sentence: Both inside and outside the U.S., lengthy periods of economic stagnation or decline have almost always <highlight>left</highlight> society more mean-spirited and less inclusive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在美国国内外，长期经济停滞或衰退几乎总是使社会变得更为狭隘、包容性更弱。

examination_example.sentence: In limited respects, perhaps the recession will <highlight>leave</highlight> society better off.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在有限的方面，也许经济衰退会让社会变得更好。

examination_example.sentence: My concern with <highlight>leaving</highlight> it up to the individual, however, is our limited sense of what needs to be achieved.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，我对把它留给个人的担忧是，我们对需要实现的东西的认识有限。

examination_example.sentence: Finally, assuming you're lost in an area humans tend to frequent, look for the marks we <highlight>leave</highlight> on the landscape.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后，假设你在人类经常出没的地方迷路了，就寻找我们在景观上留下的痕迹。

examination_example.sentence: Inevitable distractions often render the daily to-do list ineffective, while <highlight>leaving</highlight> room for improvisation in such a list can reap the best results.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不可避免的分心往往会使每天的待办事项列表无效，而在这样的列表中留出即兴发挥的空间，可以获得最好的结果。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Left</highlight> much room for readers' criticism
examination_example.sentence_trans: 给读者留下了很大的批评空间

examination_example.sentence: Have you noticed that you can <highlight>leave</highlight> on a flight an hour late but still arrive on time?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你有没有注意到你可以乘晚点一小时的飞机离开，但仍然能准时到达?

examination_example.sentence: The immune system of the body, under stress or through lack of nutrition or exercise can be weakened, but which never <highlight>leaves</highlight> us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 身体的免疫系统在压力或缺乏营养或锻炼的情况下会减弱，但它永远不会离开我们。

examination_example.sentence: For women who stay home, they never get to <highlight>leave</highlight> the office.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于呆在家里的女性来说，她们永远无法离开办公室。

sense_info_list.en: to go away from a place without taking sth/sb with you

examination_example.sentence: We plan to have a future where a lot of would-be workers do not get <highlight>left</highlight> behind.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们计划有这样一个将来，许多未来的工人不会被抛在后面。

examination_example.sentence: There is often much housework <highlight>left</highlight> behind.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 经常有家务落下。

examination_example.sentence: It is the masses beneath them that are <highlight>left</highlight> behind.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 落后的是那些不如他们的广大群众。

examination_example.sentence: Among other weaknesses, the measures cities must employ when <highlight>left</highlight> to tackle dirty air on their own are politically contentious, and therefore vulnerable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除其他劣势外，各城市在独立处理空气污染问题上不得已而采取的措施存在政治争议，因此容易受到批判。

examination_example.sentence: If <highlight>left</highlight> to themselves, such trends will diminish the relative strength of the English language in international education markets.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果听之任之，这些趋势将削弱英语在国际教育市场的相对优势。

sense_info_list.en: make something happen or remain as a result

examination_example.sentence: This <highlight>leaves</highlight> today's average law-school graduate with $100, 000 of debt on top of undergraduate debts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这使得今天的法学院毕业生平均背负着10万美元的债务，超过了本科生的债务。

sense_info_list.en: to give sth to sb when you die

examination_example.sentence: It's perhaps best <highlight>left</highlight> to science fiction writers and futurologists to explore the many possibilities we can envisage.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最好的办法是将我们所能设想到的种种可能交给科幻小说家和未来学家去探索。

sense_info_list.en: time when one has permission to be absent from work or from duty in the armed forces
to not do sth or deal with sth immediately

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 士兵或政府工作人员的“休假”称为go on leave。
意为“休息日”，通常指公休日。
指“假期”，一般指学校放的寒暑假。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 遗留; 留下; 剩下

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. （即将）离校（就业）者；离开者；故意中途退出游戏的玩家（游戏术语）

word_family.mean: v. 离开；离去；让…留下；使处于某种状态；离职；剩下；寄存；辍学；遗赠；忘记带走

sense_info_list.zh: 遗留; 留下; 剩下

examination_example.sentence: Sometimes people adopt certain beliefs in order to <highlight>leave</highlight> a favorable impression on those dear to them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有时，人们采用某些信仰是为了给他们亲近的人留下一个良好的印象。

examination_example.sentence: It may <highlight>leave</highlight> a negative impression on the interviewer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 可能会给面试官留下负面印象。

examination_example.sentence: Then we can <highlight>leave</highlight> it for another vacation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后我们可以把它留到下一个假期。

examination_example.sentence: He is going to <highlight>leave</highlight> his present job.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他打算辞去现在的工作。

examination_example.sentence: My human resources manager wants to conduct an interview with me before I <highlight>leave</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的人力资源经理想在我离开前对我进行一次面试。

examination_example.sentence: This sense of trust and self-belief later in life gave them the courage to <highlight>leave</highlight> dysfunctional relationships or embark on new career paths.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 晚年生活中的这种信任感和自信给了她们离开不正常关系或开始新职业道路的勇气。

sense_info_list.en: cause (someone or something) to be in a particular state or position

examination_example.sentence: The news has <highlight>left</highlight> investors and consumers outraged but comes as little surprise to those in the fashion industry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一消息让投资者和消费者感到愤怒，但对时装业的人来说并不意外。

examination_example.sentence: Even parents may well feel guilt that their child is <highlight>left</highlight> behind.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使父母们也会为自己的孩子落在后面而感到内疚。

sense_info_list.en: time when one has permission to be absent from work or from duty in the armed forces

word_usage.usage:
leave指“离开”，如leave Beijing 离开北京。leave本身就是depart from的意思，故其后不可再用from。
leave 指“去往”，如leave for Shanghai 前往上海。

leave是瞬间动词，不可与表示一段时间的状语连用。
示例：他离开家乡已10年了。
误 He has left his hometown for ten years.
正 He left his hometown ten years ago.
leave的过去分词left作形容词“剩下的”“没有用完的”时，通常位于所修饰的名词之后，如 money left 剩下的钱。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指公众庆祝、欢度的节日。
指按规定不工作的各种假日, 时间可长可短。在英国复数形式表示较长的假期。
主要指政府机关工作人员或军队人员获准的休假、假期。
强调永远或完全放弃或抛弃人或事物等, 这可能是被迫的, 也可能是自愿的。
着重指违背法律责任和义务, 或自己的信仰与誓言的行为, 多含非难的意味。
指把具体的东西抛掉不要, 着重扔、丢的动作。
侧重断绝感情上的依恋, 自愿抛弃所喜欢的人或物。也指抛弃信仰或改掉恶习。
普通用词, 指舍弃某事或某一职业, 或终止同某人的关系, 但不涉及动机与因果。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 遗留; 留下; 剩下

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 留话；留个信息；留个短信

sense_info_list.en: cause (someone or something) to be in a particular state or position

examination_example.sentence: When she did sleep, she experienced "problem-solving dreams," which <highlight>left</highlight> her feeling unrested when she woke up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当她真的睡觉时，她经历了“解决问题的梦”，这使她醒来时感到不安。

examination_example.sentence: The minister is also pushing to stop public transportation from being cut in ways that <highlight>leave</highlight> people isolated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这位部长还在努力阻止公共交通中断，以免人们被孤立。

examination_example.sentence: A balanced breakfast is really helpful, but getting regular meals throughout the day is more important to <highlight>leave</highlight> blood sugar stable through the day, which helps control weight and hunger levels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 均衡的早餐真的很有帮助，但一整天的规律饮食，对保持全天血糖稳定更重要，而且有助于控制体重和饥饿水平。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>leaves</highlight> the house in a mess.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它把房子弄得一团糟。

examination_example.sentence: This will be the third time you've <highlight>left</highlight> a job in the last five years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这将是你在过去五年中第三次离职。

examination_example.sentence: In her search to live a life of purpose, Leah <highlight>left</highlight> her high-paying accounting job, her husband, and her home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了追求有意义的生活，利亚离开了高薪的会计工作、丈夫和家庭。

examination_example.sentence: Yes, but other colleagues get to <highlight>leave</highlight> early, and they don't have such a lot of work to do.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是的，但是其他同事可以提前下班，他们没有这么多工作要做。

sense_info_list.zh: 遗留; 留下; 剩下

examination_example.sentence: If you're planning on being one of them soon, you might not be looking forward to the unpleasant feeling air travel often <highlight>leaves</highlight> you with.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你近期打算成为他们中的一员，你可能不会期待飞机旅行给你留下的不适感。

examination_example.sentence: People do beautiful work and <highlight>leave</highlight> beautiful messages.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们做出精美的作品，留下美好的话语。

examination_example.sentence: As the water is pumped out, the vacant space <highlight>left</highlight> is compacted by the weight of the earth above.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当水被抽出时，留下的空地会被上面的地球重量压实。

examination_example.sentence: Bacteria are carried by various "media", which can include raw food, moist surfaces where bacteria have been <highlight>left</highlight>, our hands or skin and from coughing or sneezing (打喷嚏) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 细菌通过各种“媒介”携带，包括生的食物、留下细菌的潮湿表面、我们的手或皮肤以及咳嗽或打喷嚏。

sense_info_list.en: time when one has permission to be absent from work or from duty in the armed forces

examination_example.sentence: We taught them that their social standing—that is, whether they are bullied or excluded or <highlight>left</highlight> out—can change over time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们告诉他们，他们的社会地位——也就是说，他们是否被欺负、排斥或冷落——会随着时间的推移而改变。

examination_example.sentence: The author realized that a lot of information about Asian Americans was <highlight>left</highlight> out of the textbooks he studied.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在大学上课的时候，作者意识到自己学习的课本中遗漏了很多信息。

examination_example.sentence: Even in the age of open-plan offices and social networks some work is best <highlight>left</highlight> to the individual.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使在开放式办公室和社交网络时代，有一些工作最好还是留给个人来做。

examination_example.sentence: I believe I would be in a better place if pay decisions regarding employees were simply <highlight>left</highlight> up to their employers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果关于雇员薪酬的决定完全托付给他们的雇主来决定，我相信我的处境会更好。

examination_example.sentence: Tunisia was targeted last year by three attacks that <highlight>left</highlight> 70 people dead and were claimed by Islamic State.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 突尼斯去年发生了三起袭击事件，造成70人死亡，伊斯兰国宣称对袭击事件负责。

word_usage.usage: leave的过去分词left作形容词“剩下的”“没有用完的”时，通常位于所修饰的名词之后，如 money left 剩下的钱。

leave是瞬间动词，不可与表示一段时间的状语连用。
示例：他离开家乡已10年了。
误 He has left his hometown for ten years.
正 He left his hometown ten years ago.

leave指“离开”，如leave Beijing 离开北京。leave本身就是depart from的意思，故其后不可再用from。
leave 指“去往”，如leave for Shanghai 前往上海。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指公众庆祝、欢度的节日。
指按规定不工作的各种假日，时间可长可短。在英国复数形式表示较长的假期。
主要指政府机关工作人员或军队人员获准的休假、假期。
强调永远或完全放弃或抛弃人或事物等，这可能是被迫的，也可能是自愿的。
着重指违背法律责任和义务，或自己的信仰与誓言的行为，多含非难的意味。
指把具体的东西抛掉不要，着重扔、丢的动作。
侧重断绝感情上的依恋，自愿抛弃所喜欢的人或物。也指抛弃信仰或改掉恶习。
普通用词，指舍弃某事或某一职业，或终止同某人的关系，但不涉及动机与因果。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: What time is Michael <highlight>leaving</highlight> his place tomorrow morning?
examination_example.sentence_trans: Michael明天早上什么时候离开家？

examination_example.sentence: From my place to Shelton, we have to drive through the quarters, so we'd better <highlight>leave</highlight> early to avoid the traffic.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从我家到Shelton，我们得开车穿过街区，所以我们最好早点离开，以免交通堵塞。

examination_example.sentence: As she was <highlight>leaving</highlight>, she was eager to say goodbye to each of us in the nursing team.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当她要离开的时候，她渴望和护理团队的每一个人道别。

examination_example.sentence: Donate whatever clothes are <highlight>left</highlight> over.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 把剩下的衣服都捐出去。

examination_example.sentence: When I returned home, there was not enough of me <highlight>left</highlight> for writing after a full working day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我回家时，工作了一整天之后，留给我写作的时间已经不够了。

examination_example.sentence: It was so tiny that we had to <highlight>leave</highlight> our suitcases in the hallway.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它太小了，我们不得不把行李箱留在走廊里。

examination_example.sentence: But that's how nature is — always <highlight>leaving</highlight> us astonished.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但这就是自然——总是让我们惊讶。

examination_example.sentence: Jim says we can stay in his house as long as we <highlight>leave</highlight> it clean and tidy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 吉姆说我们可以住在他的房子里，只要我们保持干净整洁。

examination_example.sentence: This newness just <highlight>left</highlight> me wanting more.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种新鲜感让我想要更多。

examination_example.sentence: To ask for sick <highlight>leave</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请病假。

examination_example.sentence: So, I called him and asked for sick <highlight>leave</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以，我打电话给他请病假。

examination_example.sentence: Asking for <highlight>leave</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请假。

word_usage.usage:
leave跟带过去分词的复合结构：
But a day’s talk left them still divided on some issues.
他们讨论了一天，但在有些问题上仍有分歧。

leave跟带现在分词的复合结构（有“离开” “留下”之意）：
His leaving left me feeling pretty bad.
他的离开使我感到相当难受。

leave跟带形容词的复合结构：
His illness has left him very weak.
疾病使他的身体非常虚弱。

leave跟带介词短语的复合结构：
All the while they were left in the dark about the case.
这件事他们一直被蒙在鼓里。

leave表"离开”，是非延续性动词，不与表示一段时间的状语连用。比较：
He has left Beijing for 3 weeks.（误）
He has been away from Beijing for 3 weeks. （正）
leave可表示“让…继续处于某种状态”。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. （即将）离校（就业）者；离开者；故意中途退出游戏的玩家（游戏术语）

word_family.mean: v. 离开；离去；让…留下；使处于某种状态；离职；剩下；寄存；辍学；遗赠；忘记带走

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 留话；留个信息；留个短信
忽略；排除；不包括；不考虑

examination_example.sentence: It's been about one month since Alex's mum <highlight>left</highlight> home．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 亚历克斯的妈妈离开家已经差不多有一个月了。

examination_example.sentence: Lights must be turned off when we <highlight>leave</highlight> the classroom.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们离开教室时必须关灯。

examination_example.sentence: The New Year Concert was so amazing that nobody <highlight>left</highlight> in the middle of it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 新年音乐会太棒了，没有人中途离开。

examination_example.sentence: He didn't leave valuable things behind, but he was a kind loving father, and <highlight>left</highlight> behind his best love.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他没有留下有价值的东西，但他是一个善良慈爱的父亲，留下了他最好的爱。

examination_example.sentence: Our hometown has <highlight>left</highlight> many soft and sweet memories in our hearts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的家乡在我们心中留下了许多温馨的回忆。

examination_example.sentence: Something should be done to help the <highlight>left</highlight>-behind children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 应该采取措施帮助留守儿童。

sense_info_list.en: cause (someone or something) to be in a particular state or position

examination_example.sentence: For example, some people believe that chopsticks should not be <highlight>left</highlight> standing upright in a bowl.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，有些人认为筷子不应该直立在碗里。

examination_example.sentence: Did you think I would <highlight>leave</highlight> you crying
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你以为我会让你一直哭吗？

examination_example.sentence: Either break up with her, or <highlight>leave</highlight> me alone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要么和她分手，要么让我一个人呆着。

sense_info_list.en: to go away from a place without taking something/somebody with you

examination_example.sentence: Because they have <highlight>left</highlight> the homework at home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为他们把作业落在家里了。

examination_example.sentence: They might say that they <highlight>left</highlight> the work at home when, in fact, they did not do the work at all.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们可能会说，他们把功课落在家里了，而事实上，他们根本没有做。

examination_example.sentence: Maybe you <highlight>left</highlight> it at home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也许你把它落在家里了。

sense_info_list.en: to not do something or deal with something immediately

examination_example.sentence: If you have difficulty answering a question, <highlight>leave</highlight> it and move on to the next one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你答不上某个问题，放在那，继续做下一个。

word_usage.usage:
leave指“离开”，如leave Beijing 离开北京。leave本身就是depart from的意思，故其后不可再用from。
leave 指“去往”，如leave for Shanghai 前往上海。

leave是瞬间动词，不可与表示一段时间的状语连用。
示例：他离开家乡已10年了。
误 He has left his hometown for ten years.
正 He left his hometown ten years ago.

表示“把某物遗忘在某处”要用动词leave，而不用forget。
例：Sorry, I left my homework at home.
对不起，我把家庭作业忘家里了。
leave的过去分词left作形容词“剩下的”“没有用完的”时，通常位于所修饰的名词之后，如 money left 剩下的钱。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 离开某地，侧重出发地而不是目的地。
最普通用词，指离开目前所在或所住之地，着重目的地而非出发地。
可与leave换用，强调目的地，但不及leave使用普遍。
